results.title: Diabetes and Cancer: a Review of Current Knowledge.
results.text_hl: The majority of studies concern @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, a drug of choice in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@, and its anti-neoplastic and @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@-suppressing activity.

citations.NLM: Wojciechowska J, Krajewski W, Bolanowski M, Kręcicki T, Zatoński T. Diabetes and Cancer: a Review of Current Knowledge. Exp Clin Endocrinol Diabetes. 2016 May;124(5):263-75. PMID: 27219686
